patthana16.79:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.79:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
